description: VMWare. Industry standard for running multiple operating systems as virtual machines (VMs) on a single PC.

script: Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList "/c cd /D `"$dir`" && cosi.exe /s /v `"/qn EULAS_AGREED=1 DATACOLLECTION=0 DESKTOP_SHORTCUT=0 STARTMENU_SHORTCUT=0 AUTOSOFTWAREUPDATE=0 INSTALLDIR=`"`"$dir`"`"`" && icacls `"$dir`" /grant Everyone:F" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -wait
Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList "/c cd /D `"$dir`" && cosi.exe /s /v `"/qn REMOVE=ALL`"" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -wait
